headline: Mysteries Boil Even Slower Onscreen
abstract: The mystery-horror hybrid gets a stylish and extremely moody adaptation from HBO and Richard Price.
lead_paragraph: “The Outsider” is not generally considered to be really top-flight Stephen King. If you look up rankings of his novels, it tends to come in around the midpoint at best and often much lower. Some people are turned off by the way it segues from police procedural mystery to supernatural skirmish. Others think the villain just isn’t scary enough.
